body: So to get unbanned you just get on ban appeal and I does it for you?
body_tagged: So to get unbanned you just get on ban appeal and I does it for you?
title: Help me please

replies.body:
A couple people linked you to the appeal section in your last post, you should click one of those and go post there instead of here so you can appeal your ban.

If you can be unbanned you will be told there

replies.body: Mods will review your appeal and remove your Infraction. 100% for now
replies.body_tagged: Mods will review your appeal and remove your Infraction. 100% for now

replies.body:
Problems will be dealt with on the appeal :).

Locking..
